TopicTitle: Need a little help with some support issues.

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I'm stuck on some support issues that aren't directly related to KSP, so I'm hoping someone here can pitch in.

[**Voodoomancer can't get his Aspire to use the Nvidia card with KSP**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118073-KSP-1-0-Startup-Whitewindow-crash), or with dxdiag, only the Intel graphics which KSP can't use.

[**Krakenfour can't get process minimizer applications to work with KSP**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117031-A-very-specific-problem), and is looking for conformation that the issue is or is not local to his/her machine.

If you can help it'd be appreciated.
